sections.title: Identify and understand your emotions
sections.description: Understanding emotions helps you recognize what you're feeling and why. We use these skills to build emotional awareness and make sense of our inner experiences. Practice identifying emotions accurately to respond more effectively to life's challenges and build stronger relationships with yourself and others.

sections.title: Why We Use DBT
paragraphs: DBT knows that some people are more emotionally sensitive than others, may have experienced an invalidating or traumatic past, and may not have the skills to manage the resulting emotions and their consequences.
DBT is scientifically proven to help reduce unproductive behavior, manage extreme emotions, and create a balanced life - especially when other therapies feel too challenging during emotional crises.

skills.title: Emotions Wheel
skills.description: Learn to identify and name your emotions accurately using a comprehensive emotions wheel

skills.title: SUDS
skills.description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale for measuring emotional intensity from 0-10

skills.title: Stun Wave
skills.description: Understanding the wave-like nature of emotions and how they rise and fall naturally
